BCA-CAD.summary: Bitcoin Atom (BCA) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate BCA through the process of mining. Bitcoin Atom has a current supply of 21,000,000 with 18,418,931.25 in circulation. The last known price of Bitcoin Atom is 0.27138365 USD and is up 6.17 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 2 active market(s) with $1,211.20 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://bitcoinatom.io/.
